job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
The candidate must have SQL skills and must also have experience using Python or R. The analyst should be able to create strong, telling visualizations using a BI Tool, indicating possible areas of further investigation. Strong communication skills are a must, in order to help explain issues to the customer and provide possible solutions. 

Data Scientist Required or Preferred Skills 

  • Solid presentation skills. 
  • Must have a Data Science Degree
  • Must have neural network knowledge/experience
  • Strong communication skills – able to give technical information in understandable terms.
  • Able to interact easily with clients.
  • SQL. 
  • Python/R experience 
  • Knows how to format and manipulate data. 
  • Subject matter expertise in military maintenance data is preferred. 
  • Experience in BI tools is preferred but not required. 
  • Must be eager to learn and have an aptitude for thinking outside of the box. 
  • Needs to be able to communicate ideas clearly and work in a collaborative environment.
  • Must have a propensity collecting and analyzing data, and presenting results in a concise manner with minimal guidance.
